channel.title: Serious Duel Arena Bug
channel.description: Ok, i beg u all here to please give me some code or something to fix this problem I finally got duel arena working,but there are a few problems. When you fight with the opponent and win for example, he gets teleported to lumby and after u defeated him you don't tele anywhere, but it's made so that u can't teleport anywhere while you fight in duel arena, so if the opponent logs out, it automatically teleports u to the duel arena resting place and if you log out it teleport the opponent to that place and says that he has defeated u but he really didn't. Please somebody help me. I'm using Delta source.

item.title: Serious Duel Arena Bug
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“dualcourse, post:2, topic:267550”]in client.java search induel then it will have a teleport there like
x 3138
y 3138 (example)

then simply change that to coords you want
[REP++] please[/quote]
Your post does not relate to his question.

On Topic -
Show me your death methods while in the duel arena.

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Duel Arena Bug
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Ok, i beg u all here to please give me some code or something to fix this problem
I finally got duel arena working,but there are a few problems.
When you fight with the opponent and win for example, he gets teleported to lumby and after u defeated him you don’t tele anywhere, but it’s made so that u can’t teleport anywhere while you fight in duel arena, so if the opponent logs out, it automatically teleports u to the duel arena resting place and if you log out it teleport the opponent to that place and says that he has defeated u but he really didn’t. Please somebody help me.
I’m using Delta source.

Read full topic
